title: Ink Saver (Sub)
paragraphs: Ink Saver (Sub) is an ability in the Splatoon series that decreases the amount of ink consumed when using sub weapons.
The number of ability points for Ink Saver (Sub) can be temporarily increased by the following abilities:
- Graph showing ink consumed by sub weapons when stacking Ink Saver (Sub).
Ink Saver (Sub) is the main ability of:

- Without refilling the player's ink tank, prior to version 2.6.0, players could only throw a single Splat Bomb, Suction Bomb or Sprinkler, no matter how much Ink Saver (Sub) was used. However, after version 2.6.0, it became possible to throw two of these sub weapons with 35 APs (Main ×2 + Sub ×5) of Ink Saver Sub.
Ink Saver (Sub) decreases the amount of ink consumed when using sub weapons by different amounts depending on the sub weapon category.
- The amount of ink consumed by using a sub weapon is indicated by the red arrow on an ink tank.
